nodes.bodyText:
Inputs between the 2 should be more unique.
Please add a parenthesis around the lambda parameter like 
  
    
      checkstyle/src/test/resources/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/lambdaparametername/InputLambdaParameterName.java
    
    
         Line 10
      in
      3835575
    
    
    
    

        
          
           Function<String, String> badNamedParameterWithParenthesis = (st) -> st.trim().toLowerCase(); 
        
    
  

 /
